content: this sock is knit from the cuff down and features an interesting cable pattern that starts in the cuff and ends at the toe the cable pattern is fun and simple so it s great for someone who wants to change up from vanilla socks for the sock veteran it s a simple and soothing knit that has enough happening so it won t be boring the size is easily customized just keep the cable in the same location with the same amount of stitches and add or take stitches away from the rest of the sock this is the perfect pattern to showcase hand dyed yarn
